web_snippets: AIC has appointed Melisa Loa as Dean of Students and Director of Residence Life. In this role, Loa will lead the Office of Student Affairs and oversee student ...
Melisa Loa began her new role as Anna Maria College's Assistant Director of Residence Life for First-Year Experience in August.
We are excited to welcome Melisa Loa as our new Dean of Students and Director of Residence Life—the first Afro-Latina to hold this role at AIC!
